product_name: The North Face Oso Animagi Hoodie Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Oso Animagi hoodie combines an insulated torso with fleece sleeves and lining for hybrid warmth that keeps girls cozy while enjoying a mountain excursion or a brisk evening in town. Lightweight polyester outer shell with Heatseeker(TM) Aero synthetic insulation delivers superb warmth for the core; soft fleece sleeves and lining offer snuggly comfort. Polyester fleece side panels and arms also encourage breathability and moisture transport. Zippered handwarmer pockets; elastic binding at the cuffs, hood and hem. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Oso Animagi hoodie combines an insulated torso with fleece sleeves and lining for hybrid warmth that keeps girls cozy while enjoying a mountain excursion or a brisk evening in town.
